summary: A comprehensive unit-test suite that verifies a directory merging utility across multiple scenarios, including merging into empty destinations, handling nested directory structures, dealing with pre-existing files, preventing traversal to parent directories, and managing cases where source and destination paths are identical.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness, safety, and robustness of the directory merging feature, ensuring that applications can reliably combine file hierarchies without data loss or security issues.
